thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 88 of 1961
thread.title: alleycat

author: alleycat
title: alleycat
text: We've been there searching around on line for tyres at a competitive price, then taking the car and what seems like an age later the tyres are fitted. So due to the nature of our commitments we decided to give this company ago. We booked on-line the date (suitable for us) the tyres we wanted at a great price. Then on the day Josh H phones to inform he was on his way, he was polite on arrival and fitted the new tyres with no trouble. He even checked the rears. What a service we will definitely be using the company again.
